summary: This document is an email chain regarding an FBI victim briefing scheduled for October 15, 2019, in Florida. An attorney from Edwards Pottinger LLC communicates that their client (an Epstein victim) wishes to attend the briefing and bring a support person, prompting coordination with the FBI Victim Services Division on security and logistics.

persons.name: FBI Victim Services Division
persons.context: Sends an email providing logistical details for an upcoming Epstein victim briefing, including security requirements and reimbursement information.

events.title: FBI Epstein Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: A briefing organized by the FBI for victims of Jeffrey Epstein, to be held at a federal building in Florida.

locations: 425 North Andrews Avenue, Suite 2, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301
keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was organizing a victim briefing related to the Epstein case in Florida on October 15, 2019.
An attorney from the law firm Edwards Pottinger LLC was representing a client who was an Epstein victim and wished to attend the briefing.
The victim requested to bring a support person to the FBI briefing, requiring coordination for security clearance.
The FBI required attendees to complete a security questionnaire (RSVP Questionnaire) for entry into the federal building.
